title: Bonded in Hope [Warlock Mating Chronicles 3]
description: [Menage Amour: Erotic Paranormal Menage a Trois Romance, M/M/F, with M/M, witches, warlocks, light consensual BDSM, HEA] Tori Grove and Jag Houser's relationship is about to implode when a sexy stranger arrives and gives them hope for the future. Lars Breland claims to be their enemy, but as Tori and Jag unravel the lies that have ruled his life for so long, his anger turns to lust. Through sexual healing, the three of them are brought closer together, but putting the past behind them requires more than physical pleasure. One by one they must reveal their dark secrets, or face being consumed by the very magic that brought them together. There are reasons some truths are kept hidden, however, and revealing them proves to have dire consequences. Together, Tori, Jag, and Lars embark on a kinky adventure that pushes each of them to the breaking point, and forms a bond of trust that will change all of their lives forever. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Suzanne Rock
